label: 成尋
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1011-1081). Went to China in 1072. Diary of his first two years in Song China San Tendai Godai San ki 参天台五台山記 (A Record of a Visit to Tiantai and Wutai Mountains," 1072-1073)."
